rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with ample storage for coats and shoes, designed to welcome visitors.
Dual-car garage ensuring easy access and secure parking for vehicles. Includes a service lift for transporting groceries.
Open-plan living space combining the kitchen and dining area, with large windows for natural light.
Minimalist design with neutral colors, abundant natural lighting, and ventilation.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize daylight and ensure cross-ventilation.
Sturdy entry door with Scandinavian design accents.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony.
Additional bedroom optimized for comfort with access to a shared corridor.
Functional bedroom for extended family members or guests.
Cozy library designed with built-in bookshelves and soft seating areas, featuring natural light from a north-facing window.

openings.description: East-facing windows to capture the morning sun and promote Vastu principles.
Balcony door leading to a private outdoor space for relaxation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with natural light and ventilation ensuring calm environment.
Functional guest room designed for flexibility and comfort.
Includes bathroom, laundry, and storage rooms, integrated into the plan with efficient design.

openings.description: West-facing windows to ensure adequate ventilation and Vastu balance.
Windows for natural lighting in service areas.
